short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Who needs RevOps when you could have BenOps?!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of the words "RevOps", "Rev Ops" and "Revenue Operations" reminding you who to ask when you have questions about your revenue operations.
